name: Johannes Marseth
note:
Sounds interesting. Are you having experience from fashion brands?
Company: Norwegian Couture

Client: Johannes Marseth

Country: Norway

Company website: https://norwegiancouture.com/

Service/Product: Norwegian Couture was founded with the idea of creating a new Norwegian clothing brand. Quality clothes for men. Released a lot of fresh and exciting designs, with the main emphasis on blazers and suits. Norwegian Couture sells clothes according to a "made to measure" concept. This means that you can have the clothes tailored to your personal goals when you shop with them, as well as more standardized sizes. The philosophy is simple, they make clothes for men who like to stand out with a perfect fit. Norwegian Couture represents something fresh and rebellious but has clear references to the classic, combined with elements from our Norwegian cultural heritage.

Immediate Requirement: Copywriter, content manager (for 3h on Tuesday and 3h on Thursday)

Additional possible positions: Marketing person (for building a strategy, making campaigns, the person who knows well European market and can manage overall operations during work) 

Next step: Interview on the 10th of February (Wednesday), 10 am our time.

name: Dr. Johannes Knewitz
note:
Iryna, thanks a lot for your kind message! Happy to have a 15 minutes introductory call, feel free to suggest something during May. 

Have a lovely evening - J

We are going to discuss options for partnership in managing human resources for  Knewitz Executives GmbH in Ukraine. 

Website: rh-s.com

Company website: https://knewitz-executives.com/

Comments: Dr. Johannes Knewitz   

(https://www.linkedin.com/in/johannesknewitz)

Lida is interested in our offer, wants to know more details on the call, conditions, prices, etc. Lid offered to book a call in May, he will have time.

Manager: Korzhova Liudmyla

client_candidates.comment: проект начался 11/05 и закончился на след день. Клиента интерсовал рекрутер с немецким, но после присланных кандидатов он сам выбрал Яну Волынець. Яна сказала, что немецкого не знает и во время обучения у нее возникли созжности, гооврила что это работа для рекрутера. не захотела дальше работать на проекте. Клиент был не в восторге. так как приложил много усилий, чтобы нанять удаленного сотрудника.

name: Roberto Boasso
note:
приложение пока только на андроиде (найди друзей в разных уголках мира по интересам_) оно не до конца доделанное, пока нужен андроид разработчик, в дальнейшем планируют перенести на iOS тоже. Предложила Андрея Кормаченко (может также помочь им и с сайтом на PHP), вернутся к нам с ответом к концу недели. 
Андрея взяли на проект с 01.10.2019, пока 2 недели тестовые, далее расмотрят вариант на долгосрочное сотрудничество. закрыли проект

Fresh results : I have reminded a client about our company and services.(01.02.2021)
